snippet: Unilever brings Clear, a hair-care brand already sold in 42 countries, to the United States with a different formulation and diverse marketing.
abstract: Stuart Elliott Advertising column; Unilever is bringing Clear, a hair-care brand already sold in 42 countries, to the United States with a different formulation; company plans to spend $250 million in next the two years for 21 varieties of Clear shampoos and conditioners to be marketed to a number of diverse audiences.
lead_paragraph: Unilever brings Clear, a hair-care brand already sold in 42 countries, to the United States with a different formulation and diverse marketing.

headline.seo: Unilever Introduces Its Clear Hair Products in America
headline.main: Clear Hair Products Enter a Cluttered Market
headline.print_headline: Clear Hair Products Enter a Cluttered Market
